name: Anima Mundi
description:
Anima Mundi is a side-scrolling, mobile puzzle platformer where you experience a journey of self-discovery and enlightenment by taking on the role of the Shaman. 

 Your objective is to traverse a region of floating islands and complete intricate environmental puzzles in order to light up your surroundings and restore its beauty. Anima Mundi is an immersive gameplay experience, providing you with uniquely composed music and beautiful Japanese-inspired visuals to make you feel at ease.
